snippet: In an interview on Israeli TV, the prime minister reiterated his willingness to attack the Iranian nuclear program without support from Washington or elsewhere.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu reiterates his willingness to attack Iranian nuclear program without support from United States or rest of world in television interview, returning to aggressive posture that he had largely abandoned since his United Nations speech in September.
lead_paragraph: In an interview on Israeli TV, the prime minister reiterated his willingness to attack the Iranian nuclear program without support from Washington or elsewhere.

headline.seo: Netanyahu Strikes Tough Tone on Possible Iran Strike
headline.main: Netanyahu Says He’d Go It Alone on Striking Iran
headline.print_headline: Netanyahu Says He’d Go It Alone on Striking Iran
